dcterms:creator: Karl Cobbe
Chris Hesse
Jacob Hilton
John Schulman
dcterms:description: Procgen offers a diverse distribution of environment configurations and visual appearances, but is limited to video games with non-realistic images and low-dimensional discrete action spaces.
dcterms:title: Procgen

dcterms:creator: Austin Stone
Oscar Ramirez
Kurt Konolige
Rico Jonschkowski
dcterms:description: The Distracting Control Suite is a challenging benchmark for reinforcement learning from pixels, containing two generalization types but lacking in diversity and complexity.
dcterms:title: Distracting Control Suite

dcterms:creator: Nicklas Hansen
Xiaolong Wang
dcterms:description: DMC-GB is developed on the DeepMind Control benchmark and is widely used for evaluating generalization algorithms in reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: DMC-GB

dcterms:creator: Aravind Rajeswaran
Vikash Kumar
Abhishek Gupta
Giulia Vezzani
John Schulman
Emanuel Todorov
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: Adroit is a sophisticated environment tailored for dexterous hand manipulation tasks, requiring exploration and fine-grained feature capturing due to its sparse reward nature.
dcterms:title: Adroit

dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA is a realistic and high-fidelity simulator for autonomous driving, investigating the control capabilities of agents under dynamic conditions.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: Manolis Savva
Abhishek Kadian
Oleksandr Maksymets

dcterms:description: Habitat is an efficient and photorealistic 3D simulator that combines numerous visual navigation tasks, requiring agents to possess scene understanding capabilities.
dcterms:title: Habitat

dcterms:creator: Yuke Zhu
Josiah Wong
Ajay Mandlekar
Roberto Martín-Martín
Abhishek Joshi

dcterms:description: Robosuite is a modular simulation framework designed to support robot learning, containing interfaces to adjust various scene parameters.
dcterms:title: Robosuite

dcterms:creator: Nicklas Hansen
Xiaolong Wang
dcterms:description: DeepMind Control (DMC) is a popular continuous visual RL benchmark, with DMC-GB developed on it for evaluating generalization algorithms.
dcterms:title: DeepMind Control (DMC)
